name: Luminescent Lazerbeam
entries: A shining line of light fires out from your hands in a line 150 feet long and 5 feet wide in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Constitution Saving throw. Creatures made of darkness, shadows, or smoke have disadvantage on the Saving throw. A creature takes {@dice 6d6} Radiant damage on a failed save and is blinded until the end of their turn, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level slot, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for every slot above 4th.
